Day of DEFEAT! Defeat the germans or americans at all cost! steady that aim and move to the objective! recommended!

Игра норм оценка 7/10 очень сильная отдача я даже поначалу убить не мог никого но привыкнуть можно,понравилось ещё тем что там мало шкалоты это + ну а графика от Valve как всегда отличная карты тоже супер огромные и есть где покрысить.Токо не нравится гогда заходишь играть на маленькие карты закидывают гранаты и стрелят из базук прямо у респауна.Так что если вам нравятся игры на движке Valve то берите без раздумей.
Best ever made multiplayer shooter. Buy it, if you love to play multiplayer shooters!
Тот же Team Fortress 2, только классов меньше, другие режими и про вторую мировую. Играть можно. Но Team Fortress лучше.
RECOMENDO.
Sou fã, um dos mais divertidos multiplayers que tenho jogado ultimamente.

Одна из лучших в своём роде! TF2 в который я наиграл достаточно часов просто даже не стоит рядом с этой игрой (Хотя они очень похожи) ! Мне эта игра понравилась с первых часов, на 2-ух часах уже стал очень хорошо играть. освоиться в игре легко! Поэтому всем тем кому нравиться TF или что то подобное брать обязательно!!!!

Day of defeat fait certainement partie des meilleurs FPS online sur la seconde guerre mondial Je trouve que se jeu et très bien fait tant graphiquement mais aussi au niveau gameplay, des maps très bien modéliser, des classes bien faites même si il n'y en a que quartes j'aurais bien aimée un lance flammes, Quand on commence a y jouer on est tous de suite attirer pendant des heures, surtout sur les partie a 32 qui sont magnifiques les ennemies viennent de partout et ils faut travailler en équipe pour réussir car un bon rush a 5 joueurs et on atteint un objectif c'est assurer. Le son est plutôt bien, les joueurs bien modéliser, les armes aussi, Le point fort du jeu, c'est les parties sur les plages de débarquement qui ne sont pas des maps officiels mais qui valent largement le coup d’être jouer (surtout coté américain) car le réalisme des plages, des coups de feu, des explosions sont vraiment très bien fait.Un autre point fort du jeu, les sucées qui font durer le jeu encore plus longtemps car ils faut passer des jours pour pouvoir tous les débloquer. En résumer un jeu que je conseil fortement si vous avez des sous a dépenser dans un FPS c'est celui ci qu'il vous faut a acheter d'urgence si ce n'est pas fait.

im recommending this game, but please be aware what you are getting into when buying this game. the game itself is perfect. i could not say enough about how fun this game could be. the only issue i have come across is the community itself. there is nothing wrong with the game, i cannot stress this enough. if it wasnt full of self rightious, PC as fuck "im better than you cause i have been here longer" ass motherfuckers id be fine. i understand that some of these servers want to "create a family friendly enviroment", which would be fine if it wasnt a "M" rated game about war and killing people. i find it funny that you can get banned from a server for "saying the "f" word, but it IS family friendly to play a game featuring very young looking soldiers killing eachother for their respective countries. if you want a game where you still have freedom of speech and everything isnt regulated by moderators that act like high school teachers on a powertrip, stay away from this game. also, ive noticed that most, if not all servers seem pretty unfriendly towards new players. i myself have never played the dod series, and just got into it a week ago. i know im new here, but it seems that since i AM new, all those caught up in their little highschool dod cliques seem to douche it up or fuck with me cause im the new guy. kinda bullshitty if you ask me, but my broke ass sadly decided to waste 10 bucks to play highschool in wwII so i guess ill deal for now.

game - 10 out of 10
community 2 out of 10 ( except for blitzkrieg whores.. thats damn near the only server ill play on since most people arent cunts on there and freestyle friday is where its at son.)

literally no servers play good, balance made maps and suffers from old game-itis where you have servers up and admins can do whatever they want and no consquences whatsoever. drop a smoke by accident in spawn { Banned for attempted grenade killing} try to be a sniper when the team arguably needs something else? {Banned for class spamming}. not to mention out of the few servers that my sanity could take before quiting. most maps try to add "spice up" mechanics where pretty much dont know the base game at all when start playing now.

all in all it suffers from alot of half life 2 aged games that major on multiplayer flaws. mainly the community

Surpreendentemente viciante. Jogabilidade ótima, já que se trata da Source Engine; Mapas de excelente arquitetura e design; Mas principalmente, a melhor característica de DoD é sua comunidade de jogadores, é a melhor comunidade que eu já vi, incluindo a de outros gêneros, e tudo isso resulta em diversão quase que 100%, já que o único jeito que eu vejo de alguém ter problemas com o jogo é se o ping estiver muito alto. Jogue, se você gosta de FPs.... ou só jogue se você simplesmente gosta de se divertir.
Claramente el mejor shooter de todos los tiempos.

Ugh!  Totally not what I expected.  Just another lame run & gun & die capture the flag small mapped games.  
Spend more time running out of your spawn than much else since kills are near instant if you get shot.  

Unless you're playing with friends and can coordinate actions, it's just repetitive spawns & deaths with one seeing little more than their half of the map.  

Sorry I paid as little as I did for an unoriginal game that brought nothing to either the genre or WWII games.
Fun as ever, but really a game for source lovers.

Congratulations! You've found a game where you can shoot other people in a WWII setting. Considering the war ended almost 60 years ago, there are relatively few places where you can shoot Nazis or shoot people AS nazis anymore. This is one of those places.

And every game feels fair-ish.  That is, the winner seems to go back and forth between my team and the other team regardles of whether the team I'm on has to deal with my ineptitude.

Plus, this game is like, what, $10 these days? If you're looking for a WWII shooter, this is one that works as a WWII shooter that is well worth $10.

Of course, Wolfenstien: Enemy Territory is just as good and costs $0, so maybe you should get that instead.

Самая лучшая игра.

J'ai 23 ans, je joue à ce jeu depuis que j'en ai 14. Simplement c'est un FPS sur lequel vous pourrez jouer contre les allemands ou americains sur des maps géniales et qui ne se comptent même pas tellement il y en as. Vous pourrez découvrir un mod Zombie qui pour moi est le meilleur de tout les modes zombies réunis quel que soit la console ou jeux. Bref il est riche en contenu et vu le nombre d'heures passés sur ce jeu, je ne peux que vivement le conseiller pour faire vivre la communautée internationale présente dessus. 

Rejoignez nous vite sans hésiter car vous ne le regretterez pas si vous aimez les jeux de tir en ligne, les maps fun crées par des joueurs déjantés et le moteur source qui envoie sur ce jeu ;)

Day of Defeat: Source is a blast to play for almost 9 years since it originally released in 2005. Everything is classic about it. It has only a couple of game modes (Capture the Flag and Detonation) but they are enjoyable. Graphics are awesome even by todays standards and the sounds are still top notch. They have added some more maps since it released but it doesn't have some of the original Day of Defeat's maps that was well received by many. Overall this an awesome game and even though there isn't as many players on the severs, its still a blast to play.

Greit spill for de som facineres av andre verdenskrig. Selv om spillet snart er 10 år gammelt (2005), så er det likevel ganske underholdende. Man får et slags bilde av hvordan, i svært, svært grove trekk, en kampsituasjon kunne være mellom amerikanere og nazister fra 1939 til 1945. Minuset er bare at krigen ser ut til å bestå av haugevis av kloner med forskjellig språk og våpen.
